name: PATIENCE.
description:
PATIENCE is a puzzle game that generates random, solvable puzzles based off of some complex rules. It's shamelessly inspired from a concept featured in a hit 2015 indie game.

Features:
- unlockable difficulties, characters, and more
- minimal and fast
- over 1.3 x 10^212 combinations
- no microtransactions or ads - completely free
- PARTICLE EFFECTS?!
